about_the_game:
Spooky Paths is a horror roguelike game in which you have to get out of a randomly generated maze.
Take control of one of the surviving children and pave your spooky path through tons of the traps.

In the full version you can:
-take travel companions with you and don't let them fall into the trap!
-play with friends
-play PvP

Features


  • Rogue-like replayability: randomly generated horror levels will scare you all the time
  • Atmospheric music and sound design
  • Minimalist interface so your focus never wavers from the experience
  • Emotional story about survival and of intriguing twists
  • Enhanced animation, graphics, and lighting effects
  • Beautiful low poly art-style
  • Puzzles

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 7 and newer, 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel or AMD Dual-Core, 2.2 GHz+
  • Memory: 6 MB RAM
  • Graphics: nVidia GeForce 440 512MB, Radeon HD 4450 512MB, Intel HD 3000
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: In this emotional roguelite horror take control of one of the surviving children and pave your spooky path through tons of the traps. Is not that enough for you? Okay, take more travel companions with you and don't let them fall into the trap!
